DOC.brief_title: AZD8683 Multiple Dose Study Healthy Volunteers Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease ( COPD ) Patients
DOC.detailed_description: A Phase I , Single Centre , Double-Blind , Randomised , Placebo- control , Parallel-group Study Assess Safety , Tolerability , Pharmacokinetics Pharmacodynamics Multiple Ascending Inhaled Doses AZD8683 Healthy Volunteers COPD patient
DOC.criteria: Healthy male volunteer healthy female volunteer nonchild bear potential , age 18 45 year inclusive suitable vein cannulation repeat venepuncture Healthy volunteer Have body mass index ( BMI ) 19 30 kg/m2 weigh least 50 kg 100 kg inclusive Healthy volunteer COPD patient Be able inhale Turbuhaler® inhaler accord give instruction well able perform spirometry Healthy volunteer COPD patient . Male COPD patient female COPD patient nonchildbearing potential ( post menopausal surgically sterilise ) age ≥40 year Visit 1 COPD patient Female healthy volunteer female patient ≤60 year must negative pregnancy test screen admission unit Healthy volunteer COPD patient Prolonged QTcF > 450 m shorten QTcF < 340 m family history long QT syndrome Healthy volunteer COPD patient History severe allergy/hypersensitivity ongoing allergy/hypersensitivity , judge investigator history hypersensitivity drug similar chemical structure class AZD8683 excipients : Healthy volunteer COPD patient History presence gastrointestinal , pulmonary , hepatic renal disease condition know interfere absorption , distribution , metabolism excretion drug Healthy volunteer COPD patient Any clinically significant illness ( COPD ) , medical/surgical procedure trauma within 4 week first administration investigational product COPD patient Any clinically significant illness , medical/surgical procedure trauma within 4 week first administration investigational product Healthy volunteer
